data.title: Don't lose out on Apple AirTags for less than $89 during Prime Day
data.meta_description: Get one of our favorite Amazon Prime Day Apple deals on a four-pack of Apple AirTags. Shop the top-rated Apple trackers for less than $89 right now.
data.text:
Amazon Prime Day Apple deals are back and selling out fast. During Amazon's big 2024 Prime Day sale today, July 16, we're seeing a ton of Apple devices on sale and flying off the virtual shelf. One of the most handy deals is on a 4-pack of Apple AirTags. Just in time for summer vacations and annual family trips, these helpful trackers have been tested on luggage, keys, purses, and more. Ringing up at just under $90 during Prime Day, you can effortlessly keep track of where all your most valuable possessions are with just a tap. Below, we've outlined a few of our favorite ways to use Apple AirTags and how to save on the devices during Prime Day.

If you're constantly misplacing your keys, wallet, or purse, these trackers are exceptionally useful tools. Simply pair the sleek trackers to your device with a simple one-tap and tuck them into your wallet, attach them to your key ring, or stick one on your dog's collar! Normally $99, a four-pack of Apple AirTags is on sale at Amazon for $88.98, saving you 10% during the Amazon Prime Day 2024.

Pair your Apple AirTag with an iPhone, iPad, or another device and attach the actual AirTag to something you want to track. You can then use the Find My app to check frequent and precise locational updates of the AirTag and whatever the AirTag is attached to or packed in. For example, put an AirTag on your keychain and pair the tracker with your phone. If you ever misplace your keys, you can check your phone to find where the keys (and AirTag) are. During our testing, we found that pairing is as simple as a tap and encrypts for your privacy. When you put your AirTag into lost mode, you'll immediately be notified when it's detected in the vast Find My network. And should your AirTag be lost closer to home, a built-in speaker can help you locate it with sound.

Tag your luggage, purse, or backpack

An Apple AirTag can be tacked to the inside or outside of your bag to make sure it’s never truly lost. Since the AirTags on their own can’t attach to anything, you might want to consider a key ring so your AirTag isn’t loose in your bag.

Find your wallet and keys

This one is obvious. Attach an Apple AirTag to your keychain or slip one in your wallet so you never lose your valuable essentials.

Track your dog

Clip an Apple AirTag to your dog’s collar with an AirTag collar holder and keep a watchful eye on your furry friend. A dog owner with an Apple AirTag installed on their dog's collar can get precise locations of where their runaway pup has escaped to.

Yes, we think so! Our tester decided that as long as you’ve squared away any potential privacy issues, and you’ve accepted the costs of any additional accessories, Apple AirTags are an excellent way to ensure some peace of mind that if your items fall astray, you won’t have much trouble getting them back. We even compared Tile trackers to Apple AirTags and chose the AirTags as the superior option. We love the accuracy and design of AirTags as well as the fact that functionality is free once you’ve purchased the tracker. “If you're an iOS user looking for the best way to keep an eye on your most treasured items, Apple's AirTag is the best tracker you can get,” our expert said.

Are Amazon Prime Day deals on Apple devices good?

Amazon Prime Day Apple deals are some of the biggest sellers for our readers. Apple devices are famous for having rare discounts, so when you find a price cut on something you want, it is safe to say that you should get it. Some of the most popular Apple deals during Prime Day include Apple AirTags, the Apple iPad Mini, the Apple Watch SE, and Apple AirPods 2 with USB-C Charging.
